svg.style: font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; background-color: white; text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;

text.tspan: Average hours worked per person employed
Figure illustrates the average hours worked per person in employment. Hours reflect regular hours worked by
full-time and part-time workers, paid and unpaid overtime, hours worked in additional jobs, and time not worked
because of public holidays, annual paid leave, strikes and labour disputes and other reasons.
Source: OECD - Productivity - Level of GDP per capita and productivity
